page.title: 14VILLAGE HALL
page.content:
The village hall was opened in 1964 having cost Â£12000 to build.
The hall is used for many functions and by several organisations.These include the Over 60's club, Local History Society,Badminton Club,Local Playgroup,Youth Club and the church. There is a Village Hall Committee which oversees the activities. The hall is also used by the local doctors as a surgery on two occasions during the week.
Often there is debate as to whether the hall can continue to function owing to the cost of repairs. Last year the flat roof had to be re-felted and this year the floor joists hjave to be renewed.
